name: James Manzo
description:
One person was killed in a police-involved shooting in Asbury Park, New Jersey.

It happened just after 10 p.m. Tuesday at the Asbury Inn on 7th Avenue.

Police say they were called and responded to a report of an emotionally disturbed person.

They fired several shots and the person was pronounced dead at the scene.

Read more:  https://7ny.tv/30VUr9w

Check out more Eyewitness News - http://7ny.tv/2suJHTd
